title: Brabantse Pijl: Elisa Longo Borghini Soloes to Comeback Victory
content:
Elisa Longo Borghini returns with a fury with a searing late-race attack to win Brabantse Pijl to fend off late chase: 'I felt very good.'

Read the full article at Brabantse Pijl: Elisa Longo Borghini Soloes to Comeback Victory on Velo.
author: ahood
